purpose: The email invites applications for two postdoctoral positions at UCLouvain focused on edge/cloud computing.
evidence_sentences: We invite applications for two postdoctoral positions at UCLouvain, Belgium.
Key points: - two postdoc positions at UCLouvain, a top Belgian university, close to Brussels;
open to holders of a Ph.D. in computer science currently outside Belgium;
competitive salary and support, including access to large-scale experimental testbeds;
These two positions are thematically open to the interest and expertise of the candidates.
They are offered as part of the collaborative RAINDROP project between UCLouvain and UNamur.
Each of the two postdoctoral researchers will have the opportunity to develop an independent research project, based on her/his interests, and under the mentoring of the three PIs.
Interested candidates should contact Pr. Etienne Rivi√®re ([log in to unmask]) and Pr. Ramin Sadre ([log in to unmask]) for any question or to schedule a call to discuss research directions.
